beak.utilities.misc module

beak.utilities.misc.replace_invalid_characters(string: str) → str[source]

Replace invalid characters in a string with an underscore. Multiple consecutive underscores will be cropped to one.

Parameters:

string (str) – Input string.

Returns:

String with replaced characters.

Return type:

str
